Southeast Dogs

North Carolina, South Carolina, Virginia, Tennessee (Nashville Area), Alabama, Georgia and Maryland. Please read the profile as some of the dogs can only be adopted in NC/SC, VA, TN, AL, GA and MD.

Contact: carolinascoordinator@chihuahua-rescue.com if you have any questions.

Rio

Rio is a handsome little guy who has fit right into his foster family.

Amelia

Amelia is a TikTok star, with over 10 million views!
